# Translate

## Usage

For detailed instructions, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                   | Support        |
|-------------------------|----------------|
| `translate-x-{n}`       | ✅ Full Support |
| `translate-x-[n]`       | ✅ Full Support |
| `translate-y-{n}`       | ✅ Full Support |
| `translate-y-[n]`       | ✅ Full Support |
